item.title: teaching
item.description: 09-10 Sep 2017 - Software Carpentry at Utah State University, website 14-15 Aug 2017 - Software Carpentry at University of Delaware,website 18-19 May 2017 - Software Carpentry at University of Arkansas, website 22-23 Aug 2016 - Software Carpentry at Johns Hopkins University, website

item.title: about
item.description: Hello! I am Mahdi Sadjadi, a recent physics Ph.D. from ASU. My advisor was Mike Thorpe. My research combined experimental results, computer simulations and mathematical theorems to gain a better understanding of glass structure and their rigidity. I have a strong passion for data science, analytics and programming. Since 2016, I have been an instructor at Software Carpentry. I was also a Data Science Fellow at Insight Data Science during Spring 2018.
